page.title: 07LIFESTYLES
page.content: POPULATION. All age groups are well represented including the 16-25 year group. THE RHIWBEBYLL AREA. The centres of activity are in the villages outside this area, but the residents have an active social life. The W.I. at Llandyrnog has many activities including an August walk to keep open the footpaths in the area. There is an Ivy club for the O.A.P's, Youth club and Brownies. The Welsh chapel has an Eisteddford, Christmas pantomime (filmed by HTV) and snooker in the vestry. THE HENDRERWYDD & LLANGYNHAFAL AREA. Here there are two public houses, the Golden lion and the White horse inn where the residents meet to play darts and dominoes, for other acivities they must go to Gellifor where there is a W.I. and other clubs.
